actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to require the Director of the Office of Personnel Management to establish a toll-free information system to provide Federal employees whose positions are being eliminated due to reductions in the size of the Federal workforce with information relating to the employment-related opportunities and benefits available to such employees.

summary.text: Requires the Director of the Office of Personnel Management to establish a toll-free telephone number to provide Federal employees whose positions are eliminated due to reductions in the size of the Federal work-force with information relating to employment opportunities and benefits available to them.

titles.title: A bill to require the Director of the Office of Personnel Management to establish a toll-free information system to provide Federal employees whose positions are being eliminated due to reductions in the size of the Federal workforce with information relating to the employment-related opportunities and benefits available to such employees.
